product_name: Craft Cool Mesh Superlight Bike Shirt - Men's
long_description: Feel cooler while you work up a sweat on warm days, indoors or out, in the men's sleeveless Craft Cool Mesh Superlight Bike Shirt. The big-hole mesh wicks, vents and dries like nobody's business. Polyester mesh has a touch of spandex for stretch and great shape retention. Craft's Superlight mesh with unique multichannel construction offers superior ventilation and cooling. Craft Cool Mesh Superlight Bike Shirt for men can be worn alone or under a jersey.
short_description: Feel cooler while you work up a sweat on warm days, indoors or out, in the men's sleeveless Craft Cool Mesh Superlight Bike Shirt. The big-hole mesh wicks, vents and dries like nobody's business.
